SIPX_CALL_OPTIONS Struct Reference

#include <sipXtapi.h>

Detailed Description

This structure gets passed into sipxCallConnect, sipxCallAccept, and sipxConferenceAdd calls and sets options on a per call basis.

Data Fields

int cbSize
 Size of structure.
SIPX_AUDIO_BANDWIDTH_ID bandwidthId
 Bandwidth range.
bool sendLocation
 True sends location header.
SIPX_CONTACT_ID contactId
 desired contactId (only used for sipxCallAccept at this moment)
SIPX_RTP_TRANSPORT rtpTransportFlags
 specifies protocols(s)/role for media.
bool disableICE
 Disable ICE for this call.
bool disableTURN
 Disable TURN for this call.
bool disableSTUN
 Disables STUN for media.
bool disableLocal
 Disables local IPs for media.
bool disableARS
 Disables ARS relaying for media.

Field Documentation

int SIPX_CALL_OPTIONS::cbSize

Size of structure.

SIPX_AUDIO_BANDWIDTH_ID SIPX_CALL_OPTIONS::bandwidthId

Bandwidth range.

bool SIPX_CALL_OPTIONS::sendLocation

True sends location header.

SIPX_CONTACT_ID SIPX_CALL_OPTIONS::contactId

desired contactId (only used for sipxCallAccept at this moment)

SIPX_RTP_TRANSPORT SIPX_CALL_OPTIONS::rtpTransportFlags

specifies protocols(s)/role for media.

bool SIPX_CALL_OPTIONS::disableICE

Disable ICE for this call.

ICE is only enabled if this parameter is set to false (default) and ICE has been enabled globally using sipxConfigEnableIce.

bool SIPX_CALL_OPTIONS::disableTURN

Disable TURN for this call.

TURN is only enabled if this parameter is set to false (default) and TURN has been enabled globally using sipxConfigEnableTurn.

bool SIPX_CALL_OPTIONS::disableSTUN

Disables STUN for media.

bool SIPX_CALL_OPTIONS::disableLocal

Disables local IPs for media.

bool SIPX_CALL_OPTIONS::disableARS

Disables ARS relaying for media.
